AI Description: PhyloFishEr is a software tool designed for the computational inference of evolutionarily conserved elements in non-coding RNA sequences. It employs a phylogenetic approach to identify conserved regions that are likely to have functional importance.
Core Features: Identifying Evolutionarily Conserved Elements In Non-Coding RNA Sequences, Phylogenetic Approach For Accurate Inference, Detection Of Functional Elements Within RNA Sequences, Visualization Of Conservation Patterns
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Phylogenetics, Non-Coding RNA
